name: set background
content:
Sets the background of the display area to an image.

When creating a Sprite Lab project, you may want to customize the background. This block has a drop-down menu of images you can use.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: The background starts white in Sprite Lab, but it can be changed to any image.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: The background can be changed multiple times throughout a project.

palette_params.name: image name
palette_params.description: The image to set as the background

short_description: Sets the background of the display area to an image.
tips:
- Click on the down arrow on the right side of the block to see which images you can choose as your background.
- Pay attention to the order of the backgrounds set. When more than one background is used together in a sequence, the last background set will be the one that is seen.
